垐字的基本解释

垐
cí
用土铺路。
憎恨，厌恶。

垐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cí］
［《廣韻》疾資切，平脂，從。］
［《廣韻》秦力切，入職，從。］
“堲3”的今字。
(1)用土铺路。
(2)用于人名。《明史·林汝翥传》有林垐。

垐字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　垐； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页227第36
〔古文〕堲【廣韻】疾資切【集韻】才資切，?音茨。【說文】以土增大道上。古作堲。

考證：〔【說文】以土增大道上。一作㘹。〕　謹照原文一作㘹改古作堲。
垐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
垐字的起名意思

暂无。

Dang
Basic explanation of words
Dang
cí
Pave the road with dirt.
Hate, hate.
Dang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cí］
["Guangyun" Jiziqie, Pingzhi, from. ]
["Guangyun" Qin Liqie, entry, from. ]
The present character of "堲3".
(1) Pave the road with soil.
(2) Used for names. "The History of Ming Dynasty·Lin Ruzhu Biography" has Lin Dang.
Dang

[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　垐; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 227 36
〔古文〕堲【Guangyun】Chief capitalist cut 【Jiyun】Only capitalist capital cut,? Yinci. [Said the text] Increase the road with soil. Ancient works. Textual research: [[Said the text] Increase the road with soil. One for 㘹. 〕　I would like to change the old one according to the original one.
